divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming back home from the vacation with my family and we were in the car.We were near the capital city Baku. But hadnt eneterd to the city yet. It wassuburb. And suddenly I noticed a light with a bow-shaped trajectory. It rised alittle and then came down while changing its golden colour to red. Then in 10seconds it disappeared. I showed it to my parents who were siting near to me.And we thought that it was a UFO. I didnt feel anything special. Nobody did, Ithink, except my Mother. She was a little afraid and nothing else.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around August 2nd 2002
Summary: I saw a light that I think was a UFO
